title: SGA Memory Distribution / SGA Bellek Dağılımı
description: Shows SGA memory allocation by component

queries.sql: SELECT component, ROUND(SUM(current_size) / (1024*1024*1024), 2) size_gb FROM v$sga_dynamic_components WHERE current_size > 0 GROUP BY component ORDER BY size_gb DESC

doc_hint: SGA breakdown by component. Buffer cache should be largest. Check if shared pool is adequately sized (no aged-out packages).
analysis_prompt: Analyze SGA allocation. Report: (1) buffer cache size, (2) shared pool size, (3) large pool allocation, (4) if large_pool needs growth for parallelism.
